item.title: Snapshot while writing data in the volume
item.description: Related issue: https://github.com/longhorn/longhorn/issues/2187 Scenario Create a kubernetes pod + pvc that mounts a Longhorn volume. Write 5 Gib into the pod using dd if=/dev/urandom of=/mnt/<volume> count=5000 bs=1M conv=fsync status=progress While running the above command initiate a snapshot. Verify the logs of the instance-manager using kubetail instance-manager -n longhorn-system. There should some logs related to freezing and unfreezing the filesystem. Like Froze filesystem of volume mounted ... Verify snapshot succeeded and dd operation will complete.
